author: nero_eth
content:
Two topics that I'd like to hear opinions on:
1. How many BALs (for how many blocks) will clients keep (e.g. treated similarly as receipts - using txlookuplimit or enforce a minimum)?
2. What are clients' thoughts on the optimizations:
There are 3 optimizations (besides sync): parallel loading from disk, parallel execution and parallel post-state root computation. As we've heard in the last breakout call, geth ( <@427903869226582018> ) and nethermind ( <@348512261955911691> ) have started to implement parallel state root computation. Iirc Erigon mentioned to start looking into / implementing parallel execution. I'm interested in, which ones are priorities to you and how complex is each optimization?
